archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: 'Return' STO Interface; Vestas SAP --> DB Schenker SAP
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation:
Returning Container + Additional Tool to site BU Purchaser creates a stock transport order (CC STO) selecting the material ### where the issuing ​storage location is 2000 in the BU and the receiving storage location is the Main stock. The pickup ​ address is entered manually into the STO by updating a new partner (YP). The CC STO is interfaced to ​Schenker using the IDoc ORDERS05
Container Location return STO When the Project organization wants to return some tools - either because the tools are not needed anymore​ or because Schenker is recalling the tool due to calibration needed – they create a stock transport order ​ (CC STO) where the issuing storage location is the “Rental container” storage location (7###) at the project​ site and the receiving storage location is the TRD (1001). The pickup address is entered manually into the ​STO by updating a new partner (YP). The CC STO is interfaced to Schenker using the IDoc ORDERS05
Link to Documentation; https://vestas.sharepoint.com/:p:/r/sites/OneTool-T153PLrollout/Shared%20Documents/T15%203PL%20rollout/00%20Requirements%20and%20Process/Vestas%20-%20DB%20Schenker%20Interface.pptx?d=w8ae74256aee84e64a3c4764fa3b4d8bb&csf=1&web=1&e=PhplWf
